SEARCH
Package com.ecom.listeners

Class RetryFailedTests

java.lang.Object
com.ecom.listeners.RetryFailedTests
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.testng.IRetryAnalyzer
public class RetryFailedTests extends Object implements org.testng.IRetryAnalyzer
Retry analyzer for TestNG to retry failed tests.

This class implements the IRetryAnalyzer interface to provide custom logic for retrying failed tests. The number of retries and whether to retry is controlled by the configuration settings.

Example usage:

 
 @Listeners(RetryFailedTests.class)
 public class YourTestClass {
     // Test methods...
 }
